label: Software and Technology
description: Search queries related to software and technology products and services.
intents: Edit and create documents and media

subcategories.label: Antivirus and Security
subcategories.description: Software and services that protect against viruses, malware, and other security threats.

subcategories.label: Productivity and Office
subcategories.description: Software and tools for creating, editing, and managing documents, spreadsheets, and presentations.

subcategories.label: Design and Media
subcategories.description: Software and tools for creating and editing digital media, including photos, videos, and music.

subcategories.label: Remote Access and Collaboration
subcategories.description: Software and tools for accessing remote desktops, managing projects, and collaborating with others.

subcategories.label: Operating Systems and Utilities
subcategories.description: Software and tools for managing and optimizing computer systems and networks.

subcategories.label: Business Software and Services
subcategories.description: Software and services for managing business operations, finances, and customer relationships.

subcategories.label: Hardware and Accessories
subcategories.description: Hardware and accessories for computers, phones, and other devices.

subcategories.label: Programming and Development
subcategories.description: Software and tools for programming, testing, and developing software applications.
